bug.author: kamo-naoyuki
bug.description:
I can not import PReLU from chainer.functions on 1.19.0. In <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pfnet/chainer/blob/master/chainer/functions/__init__.py>https://github.com/pfnet/chainer/blob/master/chainer/functions/__init__.py</denchmark-link> , the corresponding lines are comment-outed. <denchmark-code># Import for backward compatibility # om chainer.links.activation.prelu import PReLU # NOQA </denchmark-code>
Is there a reason?

comments.comment: Oh, sorry. This is a mistake.
